summary: This bill, the "Rights for the Transportation Security Administration Workforce Act," aims to improve the work conditions for TSA employees. It transitions TSA employees from their current personnel system to the Title 5, United States Code, federal regulations by a set date, providing them with enhanced protections, benefits, and union rights. The bill contains provisions addressing pay parity with other federal employees, retirement, and job security, and mandates reports and reviews regarding recruitment, diversity, harassment, and other workforce issues.  It also includes provisions regarding Federal Air Marshals and requires consultation with employee representatives in the implementation process.
